It is a fact that the SAP ERP system is implemented in a vast majority to the worlds leading organisations and only in 183 sites in Vietnam (mostly foreign owned, with few exceptions). It is proven that 98,5% of the SAP installations are not correctly configured (1500 sites audited) and consequently not adding their full potential to optimize ERP operations.

The S4/Hana migration can be highly beneficial for clients however it requires re-standardization and reduction of ABAP custom developments. It also requires 100% correct data. See my recent DQA (data quality assurance) viewpoints here: http://ow.ly/uT03305mwTA
